Title: Establishes the civilian summons review board for review of summonses issued by employees of the department of sanitation
Summary: Establishes the civilian summons review board for review of summonses issued by employees of the department of sanitation.
LawCode: Add Chap 31-A ยง760, NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing the civilian summons review board
